sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnvcatnmanage ( APPLCNT_ID , vcatn_se , bgnde , endde , vcatn_resn , reqst_de , occrrnc_year , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , noon_se ) VALUES ( #applcntId# , #vcatnSe# , #bgnde# , #endde# , #vcatnResn# , #reqstDe# , #occrrncYear# , #sanctnerId# , #confmAt# , #sanctnDt# , #returnResn# , #infrmlSanctnId# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #noonSe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnvcatnmanage SET applcnt_id = #applcntId# , vcatn_se = #vcatnSe# , bgnde = #bgnde# , endde = #endde# , vcatn_resn = #vcatnResn# , reqst_de = #reqstDe# , occrrnc_year = #occrrncYear# , sanctner_id = #sanctnerId# , confm_at = #confmAt# , sanctn_dt = #sanctnDt# , return_resn = #returnResn# , infrml_sanctn_id = #infrmlSanctnId# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , noon_se = #noonSe# WHERE applcnt_id = #applcntId# AND vcatn_se = #vcatnSe# AND bgnde = #bgnde# AND endde = #endde#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnvcatnmanage WHERE applcnt_id = #applcntId# AND vcatn_se = #vcatnSe# AND bgnde = #bgnde# AND endde = #endde#
sqlMap.select: SELECT applcnt_id , vcatn_se , bgnde , endde , vcatn_resn , reqst_de , occrrnc_year , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , noon_se FROM comtnvcatnmanage WHERE applcnt_id = #applcntId# AND vcatn_se = #vcatnSe# AND bgnde = #bgnde# AND endde = #endde#

SELECT applcnt_id , vcatn_se , bgnde , endde , vcatn_resn , reqst_de , occrrnc_year , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , noon_se FROM comtnvcatnmanage WHERE 1=1
applcnt_id = #searchKeyword#
vcatn_se LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY applcnt_id DESC , vcatn_se DESC , bgnde DESC , endde DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnvcatnmanage WHERE 1=1
applcnt_id = #searchKeyword#
vcatn_se LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
